abstract: Fernanda Santos is chronicling a day in the life of a high school principal and his school: Musa Ali Shama of Francis Lewis High School in Fresh Meadows, Queens.
snippet: Fernanda Santos is chronicling a day in the life of a high school principal and his school: Musa Ali Shama of Francis Lewis High School in Fresh Meadows, Queens.
lead_paragraph: On SchoolBook, Fernanda Santos, an education reporter for The Times, is spending Wednesday chronicling a day in the life of a high school principal and his school: Musa Ali Shama of Francis Lewis High School, a bulging-at-the-seams 4,200 student school in Fresh Meadows, Queens.
